subject: Re: Stella AU - Travel Page Changes for Domestic launch
preview: Hi Simon,   I hope all is well.  Sure, staging site has been fixed.

full_threads.body:
Hi Simon,

I hope all is well.

Sure, staging site has been fixed.

Thanks Joel, could you please fix the staging site too.
Simon

CTO

w http://stellainsurance.com.au/

I hope all is well.

Confirming this is now fixed.
https://www.stellainsurance.com.au/travel-insurance/claims/

Hey Joel, there's an issue with the travel claim form, it's not submitting, I can see in the console there's an error regarding API_SETTINGS. Could you take a look please?

https://www.stellainsurance.com.au/travel-insurance/claims/



Thank you
Simon

(Time: 30mins)

Hi Vivian,

I hope all is well.

The page has been drafted and redirect has been put in place.
https://www.stellainsurance.com.au/travel-insurance/
https://www.stellainsurance.com.au/international-travel-insurance/

Hi Joel,

Can you do a redirect for the page?


  1. We would like all traffic from /travel-insurance/ going to /international-travel-insurance/
  2. We don't need the /travel-insurance page any more so it can be turned off.
Thanks a lot,

Vivian

Vivian Yeung

Senior Marketing Manager

m 0481 362 848

e vivian@stellainsurance.com.au

w stellainsurance.com.au
Awesome work @joel

Hi Joel,

Thanks again, all looking good.

Best regards,
NAt.

Hi Vivian,

Sure, let me know if this works for you?
https://www.stellainsurance.com.au/domestic-travel-insurance/

Hi Joel, I have another request - are we able to ensure these 2 new blogs are always shown in the Blog section on the new /domestic-travel-insurance/ page?
  • Blog 1: https://www.stellainsurance.com.au/ski-travel-insurance/
  • Blog 2: https://www.stellainsurance.com.au/domestic-travel-in-australia-unexpected-events/

  • Blog 2: https://www.stellainsurance.com.au/domestic-travel-in-australia-unexpected-events/

Sure, It should be showing correctly now

Thanks Joel,

https://www.stellainsurance.com.au/travel-insurance/

Best regards,
Nat.
(Time: 60mins)

HI Natalie,

Sure, we have updated the popup menu.

Thanks Joel,

We can see the options there, but it is still showing the 'About our travel insurance' option as per the below screenshot... are you able to remove that please?

Best regards,
Nat.

Sure, we have updated the mobile menu.
